Notes: 3/16/2020 Closed indefinitely from 3/17/2020. ...Earlier notices (3/13/2020) were for "limited access" from 3/17/2020. 3/16/2020 closed until further notice. ...Earlier (3/13/2020): Programs, outreach, events cancelled through 2020-03-31. 3/16/2020 library closed until further notice. Do not return checked out items. Fines are suspended for the duration of the closure. Wi-Fi is available near the library building.
